entities.name: duelling club
entities.description: The duelling club is mentioned as the location where the scene takes place. (Excerpt: 'T HE  DUELLING  CLUB 145')

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who smirks at Lockhart's attempt to cast a spell. (Excerpt: 'Snape smirked as Lockhart quickly picked it up, saying, ‘Whoops – my wand is a little over-excited.’')

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is the teacher who attempts to cast a spell and drops his wand. (Excerpt: 'Snape smirked as Lockhart quickly picked it up, saying, ‘Whoops – my wand is a little over-excited.’')

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who smirks at Harry and whispers something in Snape's ear. (Excerpt: 'Snape moved closer to Malfoy , bent down and whispered something in his ear.')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the student who looks nervously at Lockhart and asks him to show him a blocking spell. (Excerpt: 'Harry looked nervously up at Lockhart and said, ‘Professor, could you show me that blocking thing again?’')

entities.name: wands
entities.description: Wands are mentioned as the objects used by the students to cast spells. (Excerpt: 'He raised his own wand, attempted a complicated sort of wig-gling action and dropped it.')

relationships.description: Snape whispers something in Malfoy's ear. (Excerpt: 'Snape moved closer to Malfoy , bent down and whispered something in his ear.')
Lockhart is teaching Harry a blocking spell. (Excerpt: 'Harry looked nervously up at Lockhart and said, ‘Professor, could you show me that blocking thing again?’')
Malfoy is the recipient of Snape's whispered message. (Excerpt: 'Snape moved closer to Malfoy , bent down and whispered something in his ear.')
Lockhart owns a wand that is described as being over-excited. (Excerpt: 'Snape smirked as Lockhart quickly picked it up, saying, ‘Whoops – my wand is a little over-excited.’')
Malfoy teases Harry by muttering 'Scared?' under his breath. (Excerpt: '‘Scared?’ muttered Malfoy , so that Lockhart couldn’t hear him.')
Lockhart cuffs Harry on the shoulder. (Excerpt: 'Lockhart cuffed Harry merrily on the shoulder.')
